text: Zarathos is a character from Marvel Comics, primarily associated with the supernatural horror genre and often linked to the Ghost Rider series. He is depicted as a powerful demon and the original Ghost Rider, who became bonded with Johnny Blaze, the most well-known incarnation of Ghost Rider. Zarathos is characterized by his immense power, including fire manipulation and immortality, and is often portrayed as a tortured soul, reflecting themes of redemption and vengeance. In the comics, Zarathos's origins and nature vary, with some stories depicting him as a tragic figure who seeks to be freed from his torment. He is often embroiled in conflicts with celestial beings, other demons, and the forces of good and evil. Category:Marvel Comics characters
